about.title: About Me
about.para1: With over 4 years of experience in talent acquisition and HR operations, I've had the privilege of helping startups and global organizations build exceptional teams. My journey has taken me from scaling Data & AI teams at high-growth companies to launching two game development studios from the ground up.
about.para2: I specialize in Technical, Product, and Data & AI hiring, with a proven track record of reducing time-to-hire by up to 35% while maintaining exceptional candidate quality. I've partnered with C-suite leaders to shape hiring strategies, hired 120+ professionals across diverse functions, and consistently achieved 100% fill rates even for the most challenging roles.
